snippet: Riddick Bowe, a former world heavyweight boxing champion, will make his debut as a Muay Thai fighter — a brutal mixed martial art that makes boxing look gentlemanly.
lead_paragraph: Riddick Bowe, a former world heavyweight boxing champion, will make his debut as a Muay Thai fighter — a brutal mixed martial art that makes boxing look gentlemanly.

headline.main: Bowe Is Returning to Ring, but Drive to Fight Never Left
headline.print_headline: Bowe Is Returning to Ring, But Drive to Fight Never Left
